page.title: 14Games we play
page.content: Indoor Games :- Pairs Ludo Dominos Snakes and Ladders Guess Who Chess Outdoor games :- Draughts Tennis Monoply Rugby Cludo Football Shut the box Ball Operation Netball Snap Vollyball Strip Jack naked Cricket Battle Ship Rounders Stay alive Skipping Murder in the dark Hide and Seek Seven of diamonds Tag Oranges and Lemons Kick the Can Hide the thimble Mob Mob Table Tennis Chain on Tag Tiddly Winks Ping Pong Poison Seven card Brag Off Ground on it Sevens British Bulldog Flip Frog Stuck in the Mud
